channel.title: keycap on Léo Krebs
channel.description: Recent content in keycap on Léo Krebs

item.title: Lawn Flamingo Nerdvana
item.description: Lawn Flamingo Nerdvana This sculpt is a collaboration between Primecaps and BoganCaps. It is based off a Lurdvana from Primecaps. Here displayed in the Lawn Flamingo Colorway.

item.title: GMK Universe Squatch
item.description: GMK Universe Squatch Squatch is a sculpt made by LevelCaps. Here in the “GMK Universe” Colorway, in collaboration with the eponym keyset.

item.title: TGR Alice Prototype
item.description: TGR Alice Prototype One of the early prototypes made by Yuktsi from TGR, before the official run of the TGR Alice keyboard. This is the board that started the trend of Alice-like layouts. It is built with lubed vintage Cherry MX Browns, and the keyset used is ePBT’s Purple Hangul. Artisans Quantum Creep Typebeast from GAF and Dire Wire Moondrop from Nightcaps.

item.title: 3D & BtEO Karkinos
item.description: 3D & Brigid the Exhalted One Karkinos Karkinos is a great sculpt from Kaphaus. It looks like a crab with a visible brain. Shown here in the 3D and Brigid the Exhalted One colorways.

item.title: Clean Conscience
item.description: Clean Conscience Clean Conscience artisan keycap from Bludgeoned Kaps.

item.title: OG New Reaper
item.description: OG New Reaper New Reaper from Brocaps. After releasing the Erebus sculpt, inspired from the original Reaper v1, Bro released the New Reaper. This colorway is ‘OG’. It has the skull in green glow in the dark. Photo was taken with a Ribbit from Brocaps on the right, and a tube amp for the orange effects.

item.title: Last Bone Reaper
item.description: Last Bone Reaper Reaper from Brocaps. Colorway is Last Bone. It is the last Reaper commission before the sculpt retirement from Bro. I had the chance to be part of this commission with other Reaper collectors and friends.

item.title: BBW Vaporwave
item.description: BBW Vaporwave Rubrehose is a designer creating caps inspired by rubber hose styled animation. BBW (Big Bad Wolf) in Vaporwave colorway. Photo taken in a bathtub with phones as neon color sources.

item.title: E6V2 R2
item.description: E6V2 R2 First first keyboard from a “true” Group Buy. E6V2 R2 was the second iteration of Exclusive’s E6V2, offering custom engraving in the top right badge, and top & bottom + middle pieces color combination choice. Built with Zeal Tealios (R10), lubed and stickered. Keyset on top is GMK Hyperfuse Origins. Artisans Two Kosmo v2 (Challenger and Columbia) from Omniclectic and KeyKollectiv, with a Sparkly Purple FPS Gamerset from Brocaps.

item.title: BBv2 Berserk Eva
item.description: BBv2 Berserk Eva Brocaps’ most famous sculpt: Brobot v2. Here in a Berserk colorway, commissionned in 2022. Inspired from Neon Genesis Evangelion.

item.title: Drunken Skull
item.description: Drunken Skull Clack Factory’s Skull is among the first artisans ever created. Here, in a classic Drunken colorway.

item.title: HHKB Professionnal 2
item.description: PFU HHKB Professionnal 2 A full stock HHKB Pro 2. Topre switches. Artisans Queasy Green Skull from Clack Factory, and a matching Bianchi Celeste diamond-arrow set from KeyKollectiv.

item.title: Foiled-eyes Reapers
item.description: Foiled-eyes Reapers Reapers from Brocaps. Here is one of my favourite (almost complete) set: the ‘Foiled-eyes’ collection. From left to Right: Nuggdaddy, Dark Tide, Cauldron Brew, Princess Morgan, Witching Hour. Missing Hellfire (red), the search continues.

item.title: Heavy Metal 2 Reaper
item.description: Heavy Metal 2 Reaper Reapers from Brocaps. Here is a Heavy Metal 2 (HM2) Reaper, with a ‘Y’ Reaper (from the CMY trio).

item.title: Garnet Cosmo
item.description: Garnet Cosmo Omniclectic’s Cosmo has been a long time favourite sculpt of mine. Here, in the Garnet colorway with a Mavic drone.

item.title: Unnamed Paranoid Reaper
item.description: Unnamed Paranoid Reaper Reaper from Brocaps. Colorway was a commission, it was not named at the time, so it became ‘Unnamed Paranoid’ in reference to its eyes effect.

item.title: Charon's Charge Al Bumen
item.description: Charon’s Charge Al Bumen Al Bumen sculpt is a collaboration between Nightcaps and Primecaps. Charon’s Charge colorway was released during a Halloween sale, it is, I think, my favourite from this very detailed sculpt.

item.title: Blackjack Reaper v1
item.description: Blackjack Reaper v1 Reaper v1 is my all time favourite sculpt. It was made by Brocaps. Here, in my favourite colorway, Blackjack (black hood has some glitter dust, and eyes are red foiled). Fun fact: I had the chance to acquire this cap as my first Reaper (now I own around 30 of them). I traded it two years later. Missed it instantly, so I tried hard to get it back.
